# Camera Chess Web

Record your chess games and upload them to Lichess.

## Demo
[<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/37177749/285556392-e8b5f199-1029-4333-9ff7-eca41ceacaf1.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..k2xfWyNZ90XSvm8VpLKvBTgMoRqwUSLRivi4sihkCGA" width="50%">](https://youtu.be/AAs4EX372bc)

https://www.camerachess.com
